Name: Bow Everything Mount
Desc:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Bow Everything mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.

Desc.Old:
[Master Level: 1]
This Bow Everything mount enables you to Double Jump and travel at a noticeably fast speed. Double-click your destination on the World Map, and you will automatically fly to the destination following the navigation line. (Auto-pilot is only available on certain continents, including Victoria Island. You can increase your Smart Riding Authorization Continents by purchasing Flight Permits from the Instructor Irvin.
Desc.New:
[Master Level: 1]
Ride on a Bow Everything mount that can double-jump to travel very fast.
